# While Loops

## Introduction @unplugged

In this tutorial you will write a function which contains a while loop so you can help navigate your robot.
![While Loop](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MrDGuy/pxt-skillmap-robot-conditional-loops/main/docs/static/while-loop-1.gif "While Loop" )

## Step One

Using the ``||functions:def do_something||`` code write a new function called move_until_wall.

```python
def move_until_wall():
    pass
```

## Step Two

Now click the ``||loops:loops||`` category from the toolbox and drag in the ``||loops:while||`` code to line in place of the pass. Make sure your tabbing is correct.

```python
def move_until_wall():
    while True:
        pass
```

## Step Three

Delete the True next to the while and drag in a ``||robot:can_move||`` inside the for loop where the pass had been.

```python
def move_until_wall():
    while robot.can_move(""):
        pass
```

## Step Four

Write forward inside the can_move command.

```python
def move_until_wall():
    while robot.can_move("forward"):
        pass
```

## Step Five

Delete the pass and replace it with a robot.move_forward()

```python
def move_until_wall():
    while robot.can_move("forward"):
        robot.move_forward()
```

## Step Six

At the left margin below this code bring in a ``||robot:begin screen||`` code.

```python
def move_until_wall():
    while robot.can_move("forward"):
        robot.move_forward()

robot.begin_screen()
```

## Step Seven

At the left margin below this code bring in a ``||robot:turn right||`` code and then call your ``||functions: move_until_blocked||`` function.  How far does the robot travel?

```python
def move_until_wall():
    while robot.can_move("forward"):
        robot.move_forward()

robot.begin_screen()
robot.turn_right()
move_until_blocked()
```

## Step Eight

Collect the coin and continue all the way to the goal tile getting the robot to move_forward only with the move_until_blocked function.

```python
def move_until_wall():
    while robot.can_move("forward"):
        robot.move_forward()

robot.begin_screen()
robot.turn_right()
move_until_blocked()
robot.collect_coin()
robot.turn_left()
move_until_blocked()
```


```customts
    tiles.loadMap(tiles.createMap(tilemap`level1`))
    robot.beginScreen()
    game.onUpdate(function () {
        if (robot.goalReached()) {
            music.play(music.melodyPlayable(music.powerUp), music.PlaybackMode.UntilDone)
            game.splash("You reached the goal!")
            game.reset()
        }
    })
```
